SQL_STMT_U.val: select ItmsGrpCod,ItmsGrpNam,BalInvntAc,SaleCostAc,RevenuesAc,ExpensesAc from oitb (nolock) where cast(ItmsGrpCod as varchar) like '%:1%' and ItmsGrpNam like '%:2%' :3 :4

ExpSyntax.val: IF({0,137},' and (BalInvntAc is null or SaleCostAc is null or RevenuesAc is null or ExpensesAc is null)','')
